Description

Help three characters destroy hordes of zombies using many weapons. Run, shoot and switch between characters to be victorious in different game modes.

History

OSES started as a simple zombie survival project back in 2014. It tried to explore the character switching mechanic in different and novel ways. Some time after going to greenlight, the project had to be put on hold. In 2017, developer Andrei restarted production of the game and, with the help of Luiz applyed years of experience to make a better game, exploring even more the core mechanic, and adding layers of strategy and variety to the original idea.

Features

  • Character swapping mechanic. Switch control strategicaly to survive!
  • 4 distinct game modes to keep the game fresh.
  • Character customization. Customize your survivors to your liking with many colors, hats and weapons!
  • Built-in level editor with steam workshop integration
  • Steam leaderboards for all game modes on main and community maps
